title: Dawnbringer riven icon
body: I used 280 tokens to unlolck dawnbringer riven icon but it doesnt't appear in my account and my tokens also disappeared. Can someone help me please?

replies.body: Sometimes those icons take a little bit before they show up. I took a peek at your account and I do see it in your list of available icons now, but let me know if you still can't see it.
